name: Default Configuration
description: Default AI prompt configuration for market research reports

prompts.label: Report Title
prompts.prompt: Generate a professional market research report title for {market}. Include forecast years (2024-2030) and make it SEO-friendly. Format: "Global [Market Name] Market Analysis [Years]"

prompts.label: Executive Summary
prompts.prompt: Write a comprehensive executive summary for {market} including current market size, key growth drivers, major trends, challenges, and forecast outlook. Keep it under 200 words.

prompts.label: Market Size
prompts.prompt: Provide the current market size for {market} in USD. Format as "$X.X Billion" or "$X.X Million". Include the base year (2024).

prompts.label: Market Size Forecast
prompts.prompt: Provide the forecasted market size for {market} in USD by 2030. Format as "$X.X Billion" or "$X.X Million". Base the forecast on current growth trends and CAGR projections.

prompts.label: CAGR
prompts.prompt: What is the projected CAGR (Compound Annual Growth Rate) for {market} from 2024-2030? Provide only the percentage value like "15.2%".

prompts.label: Industry Category
prompts.prompt: What industry category does {market} belong to? Choose from: Technology, Automotive & Transportation, Energy & Environment, Healthcare & Pharmaceuticals, Financial Services, Consumer Goods, Manufacturing, Real Estate. Provide only the category name.

prompts.label: Target Audience
prompts.prompt: Who is the target audience for a {market} research report? List 3-5 key stakeholders, decision makers, and professionals who would benefit from this research.

prompts.label: SEO Keywords
prompts.prompt: Generate 8-10 SEO keywords for {market} research report. Include market-specific terms, industry keywords, and research-related phrases. Separate with commas.

prompts.label: Market Size Analysis
prompts.prompt: Provide detailed market size analysis for {market}. Include historical data (2020-2023), current valuation (2024), growth projections (2025-2030), regional breakdown, and key factors driving market expansion.

prompts.label: Market Share Analysis
prompts.prompt: Analyze the market share distribution in {market}. Include top 5-7 leading companies, their approximate market share percentages, competitive positioning, and recent market movements.

prompts.label: Market Analysis
prompts.prompt: Conduct comprehensive market analysis for {market}. Cover market dynamics, key growth drivers, major restraints, emerging opportunities, potential threats, and regulatory landscape.

prompts.label: Market Trends
prompts.prompt: Identify current and emerging trends in {market}. Include technological innovations, consumer behavior shifts, regulatory changes, sustainability trends, and disruptive technologies.

prompts.label: Key Market Players
prompts.prompt: List and analyze key players in {market}. Include company profiles, market strategies, recent developments, partnerships, product launches, and competitive advantages for top 7-10 companies.

prompts.label: Table of Contents Generator
prompts.prompt: Generate a comprehensive table of contents for a market research report on "{market}". Format each line as: Chapter/Section Number | Title | Level (1, 2, or 3). Use the format exactly like: "1|Methodology and Scope|1" or "1.1|Market scope and definition|2". Include chapters on methodology, executive summary, industry insights, competitive landscape, market estimates by different segments (product type, application, region), and company profiles. Make it comprehensive with proper numbering and hierarchy.
